data.text:
(It's early summer, but there's still some snow left 
in the mountains. The lakes can get terrifyingly cold)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
(I can feel the chill. My teeth are chattering. ……but 
that's why there's meaning in enduring. My weakness, 
fragility, all of it will freeze and shatter. And then――)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text: (Building up a strong heart――!)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
Fuu-…… ……I need to change my clothes before my body 
gets too cold. If I catch a cold, there would be no point.
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text: (――……It's been about a week since I've entered these mountains)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
(Placing myself in a harsh environment, and 
meditating by the lake, I can feel the effects. 
……It's okay. I can feel myself getting stronger)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text: (For the 『NHK Mile Cup』, my preparations are proceeding――)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
(At the 『Hanshin Juvenile Fillies』, honestly, 
I could tell that I was severely lacking)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
(Even though she let 1st place escape her, Kraft still 
placed 3rd. On the other hand, I didn't even place.)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
(But, by the 『Fillies' Review』 I had closed 
to a distance of a head. And at the 『Oka Sho』, 
our difference was a tenth of a second)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
(I don't think there was a big difference between 
our strength. But even then I was still one step, 
just one step short. One thing I was missing)
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
……from here on out, rather than the physical, 
this is the place for mental. But that's why…… 
I'll push myself to the limit and train myself……!
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text: Until the 『NHK Mile C』, definitely……!
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
――That's right, Trainer. I want my next race to 
be the 『NHK Mile C』, that's what I just said. 
……Please. Let me compete against Rhein Kraft.
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
『Hanshin JF』『Fillies' Review』 and 『Oka Sho』…… 
In every race, she pulled ahead of me.
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
Kraft is the wall currently stopping me. If I can't overcome 
her here and now, then I won't be able to continue……!
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
She has something that I don't. To take hold of that…… 
rather than the 『Oaks』 I will choose the 『NHK Mile C』!
data.name: Daring Heart

data.text:
And so, everyone spent April training hard……and then, early 
May, the skies were cloudy on the day of the 『NHK Mile Cup』.

『Soon, the race will begin here at the Tokyo Race Course. 
It's unfortunate that the sky is cloudy, but the crowd 
is still filled with tremendous excitement!』
data.name: Announcer

data.text:
『That's because, for the Classic class, this is the race to 
decide the "Generation's Fastest". Where runners from the 
triple crown, tiara, and short distance rotations gather――』
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
『To decide who stands at the pinnacle in 
terms of speed. I'm really looking forward 
to just what kind of speed they'll show us!』
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
『Furthermore, this time, the Oka Sho Uma Musume, Rhein Kraft, 
is participating. She's getting quite a bit of attention!』
data.name: Announcer

data.text:
『This is the first time in history the Oka 
Sho Uma Musume has participated in the NHK 
Mile C. What kind of run will she show us?』
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
『Will she win against this group of young competitors, proud of 
their speed, and achieve this unorthodox double crown for the 
first time in history? Now, the NHK Mile C will soon begin!』
data.name: Announcer

data.text:
――Yes, Trainer-san. 
I'm fine.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
For each of the girls participating, I've done a lot 
of investigating and analyzing. No matter what situations 
arise, I think I can stay calm and handle them.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
Get out front at the start, take control of the pace, and 
push through with power. I know how I should be running!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text: Yeah! I'm off!
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
……I'll break through. Carve a path. 
With my legs. With a run of my own.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

data.text:
My dream, my apsirations, my heritage…… 
I'll connect them to the future!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
